revision.comment: Fixed a typo found by [[Wikipedia:Typo Team/moss]] – you can help!
revision.text:
{{wiktionary|creation|creating}} {{wikiquote}} '''Creation''' may refer to:
{{tocright}} ==Religion== * [[Creation ex nihilo]], the concept that matter was created by God out of nothing * [[Creation myth]], a religious story of the origin of the world and how people first came to inhabit it * [[Creationism]], the belief that the universe was created in specific divine acts and the social movement affiliated with it * [[Genesis creation narrative]], two biblical accounts of creation * [[Creation Ministries International]], a Christian apologetics organization
==Entertainment== ===Music=== ====Albums==== * [[Creation (EP)|''Creation'' (EP)]], 2016 EP by Seven Lions * [[Creation (John Coltrane album)|''Creation'' (John Coltrane album)]], 1965 * [[Creation (Keith Jarrett album)|''Creation'' (Keith Jarrett album)]], 2015 * [[Creation (Archie Roach album)|''Creation'' (Archie Roach album)]], 2013 * [[Creation (The Pierces album)|''Creation'' (The Pierces album)]], 2014 * ''Creation'', album by [[Creation (Japanese band)|Creation]] * ''Creation'', album by [[Leslie Satcher]] 2005
====Songs==== * [[Creation (William Billings)|"Creation" (William Billings)]], a hymn tune composed by William Billings * ''The Creation'', 1954, an orchestral song by [[Wolfgang Fortner]] * "Creation", a song by [[The Creation (band)|The Creation]], 1994 * "Creation", a song by [[Joe Higgs]], 1976 * "Creation", a song by [[Jonathan King]], 1965 * "Creation", a song by The Pierces from ''[[Creation (The Pierces album)|Creation]]'', 2014 * "Creation", a song by Zion I from ''[[Mind over Matter (Zion I album)|Mind Over Matter]]''
====Other uses in music==== * [[Creation (American band)]], a teen musical group * [[Creation (Japanese band)]], also known as Blues Creation, led by Kazuo Takeda * [[The Creation (band)]], a British band * [[The Creation (Haydn)|''The Creation'' (Haydn)]], a 1798 oratorio by Joseph Haydn * ''Creation'', Nathaniel Shilkret's contribution to the ''[[Genesis Suite]]'' (1945) * [[Creation Records]], a record label created in 1983 by Alan McGee
===Other uses in entertainment=== * [[Creation (2009 film)|''Creation'' (2009 film)]], by Jon Amiel about the life of Charles Darwin * [[Creation (unfinished film)|''Creation'' (unfinished film)]], a 1931 film that inspired ''King Kong'' * [[Creation (novel)|''Creation'' (novel)]], a 1981 novel by Gore Vidal * [[Creation (Dragonlance)]], creation of Krynn, a fictional world of Dragonlance * ''Création'', a 1940 ballet by [[Shirō Fukai]] * "''[[The Creation of Adam]]''" (ca. 1511), a 1512 section of Michelangelo's fresco Sistine Chapel ceiling * ''The Creation: An Appeal to Save Life on Earth'' (2006), a book by biologist [[Edward O. Wilson]] * "The Creation" (1927), a poem by James Weldon Johnson, published in ''[[God's Trombones: Seven Negro Sermons in Verse]]'' * ''[[La création du monde]]'', a 1923 ballet by Darius Milhaud
==See also== *[[Create (disambiguation)]] *[[Creator (disambiguation)]] *[[Creation of the world (disambiguation)]] *[[The Creation (disambiguation)]] *[[Generate (disambiguation)]] *[[Origin (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation}}
